altername_name: My English Coach para Hispanoparlantes: Ingles a Tu Alcance!
name: My English Coach: Para Hispanoparlantes
overview: My English Coach: Para Hispanoparlantes was released on March 10, 2009. It was published by Ubisoft for NDS. Playing My English Coach for 15 to 20 minutes a day helps you to become fluent in English. This Nintendo DS application teaches the basics of word use, grammar, and construction of phrases through fun and easy-to-play mini-games, and evaluates your progress.
